abstract: For the second time in a year and a half, the panel is pressing the Tate to return an oil landscape by John Constable to the heirs of a Jewish aristocrat.

headline.main: British Panel Urges Tate to Return Looted Constable Painting, Again

snippet: For the second time in a year and a half, the panel is pressing the Tate to return an oil landscape by John Constable to the heirs of a Jewish aristocrat.
